place.name: SOUTHDEAN
place.gazetteerText: Southdean, par., on SE. border of Roxburghshire, on Jed Water, 27,929 ac., pop. 724; P.O.; the church is at Cheaters, 7 miles SW. of Jedburgh. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
